sentences.sentence: We had lunch together. After ghat I sent her back home.
sentences.translation: 我们共进午餐，然后送李欣回家。

sentences.sentence: Once I saw a devotee of the Divine Mother at the bathing-ghat on the Ganges.
sentences.translation: 一次，我看到一位神圣母亲的奉献者在恒河岸边的石梯上沐浴。
